574750.name: Zombie Playground™ OST
574750.description:
The Zombie Playground Original Soundtrack is here! Featuring a full 15 track OST from the one-and-only Shawn Lee, 2 moody and mysterious ambient tunes by Palmer's Medic, and a bonus track by newcomers BigLeaf.

Shawn Lee actually busted out REAL INSTRUMENTS (crazy we know...) along with some killer 80's synth nostalgia to create the amazing Zombie Playground OST. Palmer's Medic was commissioned to lend their expertise to the ambient side - creating some complex yet subtle electronic tunes to enhance the game's mood. BigLeaf finishes it off with a bonus, rockin', guitar driven melody (what's with this real instrument stuff??).

Enter our imaginary world of monsters through 18 amazing tracks:

1. Main Theme
2. Playground Love
3. Zombie 380
4. Zombie Rider
5. Brain Brunch
6. Corridor Horror
7. Dead Man Walking
8. Faster Faster
9. Hammer Horror
10. Janitor Strikes Back
11. Janitors Jam
12. On The Prowl
13. Zombie Shuffle
14. Apocalypso
15. ZPG Ballad

16. Atmosphere 1
17. Atmosphere 2

18. As One* (bonus track)

Note: Additional tracks may be added in the future
574750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
